thread.title: Joss Whedon made more money from 'Dr Horrible' than 'Avengers'
thread.title_full: Joss Whedon made more money from 'Dr Horrible' than 'Avengers' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Joss Whedon made more money from 'Dr Horrible' than 'Avengers'
text:
Director-screenwriter Joss Whedon has earned more from his independent internet musical "Dr Horrible's Sing-Along Blog" than from writing and directing Marvel's first blockbuster "Avengers" film.
READ: â€‹ Deleted scene from 'Avengers: Age of Ultron' revealed
The 51-year-old Buffy the Vampire Slayer creator made the shocking revelation at the screening of the 45-minute Dr Horrible tuner starring Neil Patrick Harris, Felicia Day and Nathan Fillion, reported Variety.
"Avengers" that released in 2012 grossed more than USD 600 million domestically alone.
Dr Horrible , a musical about the titular super villain played by Harris, was conceived of by Whedon during the 2007-2008 writers strike.
